answers.answer: Most mc are due to a genetic problem with the embryo.  I think you need to take care of this situation with your step-daughter and get yourself in the best physical health possible.As a step-child, I just want to tell you that your step-daughter is probably angry and scared and is lashing out at you because you are nearby.  I would highly recommend counselling.  Where are her biological folks.

nobody is goning to be able to tell you why you miscarried.  although your circumstances are abnormal.  everyone has stresses to deal with.  abnormal blood sugars can inhibit a pregnancy so can stress, caffeine use and just about anything we do.  as far as your step-daughter is concerned, how old is she??  it seems you have alot of animosity toward her, if she is younger it may not be good to harbour that for you nad her.  good luck.  but you will never have an answer.  like many of us we would like answers as far as to why but people miscarry unfortunately for no apparent cause... hope this gives you some peace..

question: i am diabetic and severely depressed my blood sugars were wcked but wen we fixed them i macarried two days later i was also accused of child abuse from my step daughter this is the second time she has dome thisbut apparently my baby quit growng around the time they tool me in for quetioningbut didnt pass for 5 more weeks i asked my doctors if the stress was what caused it or diabetes my stepdaughter also threw a fake phone which are very heavy and it hit me in the gut  so does any of this have to do with the miscarriag i need some answers or im gonna go nuts thank you
title: why did i miscarry
